resources.string: Make \"Do Not Disturb\" your new default.
DetoxDroid will support you in winding down your smartphone use and curb with your smartphone addiction.
DetoxDroid automatically (re-)activates the do not disturb mode. Exceptions can be made with the system settings.
Take a break from taking a break.
DetoxDroid can be paused for a defined period of time, for example if you want to take a quick look on a photo somebody sent you. It will automatically come back into life, once the pause is over.
Duration of the pause in minutes
Add pause button tile to quick settings
Pause on long-pressing the home button
Color up by coloring down your phone
Strip away all the neuron-stimulating colors (hint: you can add your camera and gallery app to the exceptions).
DetoxDroid is open-source and without ads. If you find the app useful, please consider leaving a donation to support the development of the app.
You need to grant DetoxDroid elevated privileges from your computer.
